record.description: A group of students learn how to use hand grenades as part of the basic pre-service military training course they are taking at the University of Chicago. Left to right: George Babrinskoy, instructor, Julian H. Isaacs, H.A. MacLeod, A.M. Wierman and Richard I. Kahl.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached news clipping, fuzzy material on back, paint on surface.
